summary: A cinematic landing page with a dynamic liquid-light beam that flows through the page and collides with the demo section like glowing water. The beam behaves with physics-inspired fluid dynamics, creating an immersive, award-winning visual experience that extends the Huly.io aesthetic.

visual_language.core_concept: Narrow vertical beam of glowing liquid light that behaves like a fusion of water, plasma, and energy

blur_layers: Core: 20-40px blur for sharp plasma center
glow_structure.falloff: Smooth radial gradient from center, simulating underwater light diffusion

physics_behavior.reflectivity: Water-like shimmer with subtle noise displacement
physics_behavior.collision_dynamics: Energy conservation - beam splits into two curved streams, dispersing particles outward
physics_behavior.flow_animation: Continuous vertical translate with subtle scale variations (scaleY: 1.0-1.05)

hero.description: Full-intensity liquid beam flowing vertically behind headline
key_features: Three-layer beam system (core, inner glow, outer diffusion)
Animated liquid particles (5 droplets) flowing downward
Vertical noise displacement for organic flow
Parallax scroll effect - beam moves slower than content
Grain texture overlay for cinematic quality
hero.headline: Everything App for your teams
hero.subheadline: The visual platform where infrastructure flows like liquid light. Build, deploy, and scale with the beauty of simplicity.

features.description: Subtle background beam continues behind feature cards
key_features: Slow vertical flow (20s cycle) for ambient movement
Beam serves as atmospheric backdrop, not focal point
card_effects: Hover: radial glow matching beam colors
Icon rotation and scale on hover

demo.description: THE CENTERPIECE - Beam collides with demo section, creating dramatic splash and split

collision_sequence.effect: Beam intensifies, opacity increases to 1.0, blur tightens
White flash at center, radial explosion gradient (200px), ripple waves expand
Beam splits into two curved streams at ±45° angles, flowing diagonally outward
12 particle droplets scatter radially, fading as they travel

visual_effects: Refraction distortion at collision point (radial gradient blur)
Dual curved light trails with gradient tails
Concentric border rings simulating water ripples

testimonials.description: Diffused mist-like glow fills background after collision
key_features: Horizontal gradient layers simulating settled energy
8 ambient glow particles floating and pulsing
No vertical beam - pure atmospheric diffusion

pricing_and_footer.description: Remaining light becomes faint horizon glow
visual_treatment: Soft radial gradient at bottom (from violet to transparent)
Minimal beam presence - just ambient reflection
Maintains depth without distraction from content

beamFlow.description: Continuous vertical downward movement simulating liquid falling

beamPulse.description: Subtle breathing effect simulating energy oscillation

beamCollision.scroll_trigger: when Demo section reaches center of viewport

phases.name: Particle Scatter
phases.animation: radial dispersion, opacity fade, scale reduction

rippleEffect.description: Expanding concentric circles simulating water impact ripples

physics_notes.flow_mechanics: Beam exhibits laminar flow with periodic turbulence (noise displacement)
physics_notes.viscosity_simulation: Slow, honey-like movement prevents jarring motion - creates elegance
physics_notes.energy_conservation: Upon collision, kinetic energy converts to: 60% split streams, 30% particle scatter, 10% radial glow
physics_notes.luminosity_decay: Exponential falloff - brightness decreases with distance squared from core
physics_notes.refraction_effect: Subtle distortion at collision point simulates light bending through water
physics_notes.particle_physics: Droplets follow parabolic paths with gravity-like deceleration
physics_notes.opacity_layering: Multiple transparent layers create depth - additive blending for plasma effect

technical_implementation.approach: Hybrid CSS + Framer Motion (no WebGL needed for performance)
performance_optimizations: Use CSS transform instead of position changes (GPU acceleration)
Limit blur to 150px max to avoid excessive repaints
Use will-change: transform, opacity on animated elements
Lazy render collision effects only when Demo section is near viewport
browser_support: Modern browsers with CSS backdrop-filter support
Framer Motion for cross-browser animation consistency
Graceful degradation: static gradients if animations disabled

component_architecture.LiquidBeamBackground.tsx: Reusable beam component with 4 variants (hero, features, pre-collision, post-collision)
component_architecture.BeamCollision.tsx: Specialized collision effect with scroll-triggered state machine
component_architecture.Integration: Import and place in section backgrounds with variant prop

accessibility_notes.reduced_motion: All animations disabled via CSS @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)
accessibility_notes.color_contrast: Text maintains WCAG AA compliance - never overlays beam directly
accessibility_notes.performance: Target 60fps on modern devices, 30fps minimum on older hardware
accessibility_notes.semantic_html: Beam is decorative only - does not convey critical information

next_steps: Fine-tune beam particle shader or noise displacement texture for more organic flow
Optimize performance - run Lighthouse audit to ensure 60fps during scroll
Adjust glow decay timing post-collision based on user testing feedback
Consider adding subtle sound effects on collision (optional, user-controlled)
Add WebGL fallback for more advanced refraction effects if budget allows
Test on various screen sizes - ensure beam scales proportionally
A/B test beam intensity - some users may prefer more subtle effect
Create dark/light mode variants (currently optimized for dark)
Add easter egg - click on beam to create ripple effect
Implement beam color theming system for brand customization

design_philosophy.inspiration: Huly.io's cinematic depth + physics of flowing water + luminescence of plasma
design_philosophy.emotion: Awe, fluidity, technological elegance, liquid intelligence
design_philosophy.differentiation: Unlike static gradients, this beam LIVES - it flows, collides, and reacts
design_philosophy.brand_alignment: Infrastructure should feel effortless, like water finding its path
design_philosophy.user_experience: Scroll becomes an interactive journey - users discover the collision moment
design_philosophy.award_potential: Combines technical innovation with artistic execution - suitable for Awwwards, CSS Design Awards

components: components/landing/Hero.tsx - Updated with hero beam variant
file_structure.dependencies: Framer Motion (already installed), Tailwind CSS, Lucide React icons

performance_metrics.animation_layers: Maximum 8 concurrent animated elements per section
performance_metrics.scroll_performance: Debounced to 16ms intervals, passive event listeners
performance_metrics.paint_optimization: Isolated to transform/opacity properties (no layout thrashing)
